sentences.en: a trio for piano, oboe and bassoon
sentences.cn: 钢琴、双簧管及大管三重奏

sentences.en: Adagio and Rondo for glass harmonica, flute, oboe, viola, and cello.
sentences.cn: 为玻璃乐器, 长笛, 双簧管, 中提琴, 与大提琴的慢版与轮旋曲.

sentences.en: Andante , trio for Oboe, Clarinet and Bassoon.
sentences.cn: 行板木管三重奏(为双簧管 、 单簧管、大管).

sentences.en: How do you like woodwind, say, an oboe?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢木管乐器吗, 比如说双簧管?

sentences.en: I asked him why he did not play the oboe any more.
sentences.cn: 我问他为什么再也不吹双簧管了.

sentences.en: I encourage oboe and clarinet players to use plenty of vibrato.
sentences.cn: 我鼓励演奏双簧管和单簧管的乐手们多使用颤音。

sentences.en: In the middle section the " fixed idea " reappears in waltz time, introduced by flute and oboe.
sentences.cn: 在中部, 长笛和双簧管用园舞曲的节奏再次引出了 “ 固定乐思 ”.

sentences.en: Linus : That would be the oboe.
Musical Instrument Cross Stitch bassoon oboe +!
sentences.cn: 乐器跨针巴松管双簧管+!

sentences.en: She has taken up ( ie has begun to learn to play ) the oboe.
The oboe and cello sat alone, echoing tone for tone.
sentences.cn: 双簧管和大提琴双重奏, 音调此起彼伏.

sentences.en: The oboe and the clarinet have got certain features in common.
sentences.cn: 双簧管和单簧管有些相似之处。

sentences.en: The oboe tends to lose power in the upper register , but with the clarinet the opposite is the case.
sentences.cn: 双簧管往往在高音区效果不佳, 而单簧管则正好相反.

sentences.en: They also use real classical musicians - violins, cellos, oboe, choir, and so on.
sentences.cn: 他们还使用真正的古典管弦乐队:小提琴 、 大提琴 、 双簧管 、 合唱团, 诸如此类.

sentences.en: Why does a trumpet--If I asked a trumpet to play this pitch, a trumpet played, and then I asked an oboe to play it, the sound would be very different.
sentences.cn: 小号为什么...,如果我用小号演奏这个音高,小号演奏后,我又让双簧管来演奏,声音会很不一样

trans.tran_en: a wooden musical instrument like a narrow tube, which you play by blowing air through a reed
